spell_tooltip.description:
Rake the target for 60,172 Bleed damage and an additional 340,629 Bleed damage over 11.3 sec. 

While stealthed, Rake will also stun the target for 4 sec and deal 60% increased damage.

Awards 1 combo point.
Heals you for 20% health over 5 sec, and increases healing received by 20%.
Rake, Rip, and Thrash damage increased by 10%.
Thrash all nearby enemies, dealing immediate physical damage and periodic bleed damage. Damage varies by shapeshift form.

Stamina increased by 4%.

Stamina in Bear Form is increased by an additional 5%.
Frenzied Regeneration and Barkskin increase all healing received by 20%.
Nullifies corrupting effects on the friendly target, removing all Curse and Poison effects.
Physical damage and Armor increased by 6%.
Increases armor by 87,172 for 9 sec.
Barkskin's duration is increased by 4 sec.
Magical damage and healing increased by 6%.
Reduces all damage taken by 4%.
You charge and bash the target's skull, interrupting spellcasting and preventing any spell in that school from being cast for 3 sec.
Fly to a nearby ally's position.
Soothes the target, dispelling all enrage effects.

When a hit deals more than 12% of your maximum health, instantly heal for 10% of your health.

This effect cannot occur more than once every 30 seconds.
Increases your movement speed by 15%.
When you fall below 40% health, you cast Frenzied Regeneration, up to once every 90 sec.
When you use Barkskin or Survival Instincts, absorb 475,723 damage for 8 sec.
Shift into Bear Form and let loose a wild roar, increasing the movement speed of all friendly players within 15 yards by 60% for 8 sec.
Blasts targets within 15 yards in front of you with a violent Typhoon, knocking them back and reducing their movement speed by 50% for 6 sec. Usable in all shapeshift forms.

Conjures a vortex of wind for 10 sec at the destination, reducing the movement speed of all enemies within 8 yards by 50%. The first time an enemy attempts to leave the vortex, winds will pull that enemy back to its center. Usable in all shapeshift forms.
Survival Instincts and Barkskin reduce damage taken by an additional 10%.
Well-Honed Instincts can trigger up to once every 90 sec.

You gain 12% of a stat while in each form:

No Form: Haste
Cat Form: Critical Strike
Bear Form: Versatility
Moonkin Form: Mastery
Moonfire and Sunfire damage increased by 10%.
Infuse a friendly healer with energy, allowing them to cast spells without spending mana for 8 sec.
Shift into Bear Form and invoke the spirit of Ursol to let loose a deafening roar, incapacitating all enemies within 10 yards for 3 sec. Damage may cancel the effect.
Physical damage dealt by your abilities increased by 5%.
Form a bond with an ally. Your self-healing also heals your bonded ally for 10% of the amount healed. Your healing to your bonded ally also heals you for 8% of the amount healed.

Abilities not associated with your specialization are substantially empowered for 45 sec.

Balance: Cast time of Balance spells reduced by 30% and damage increased by 20%.

Feral: Gain 1 Combo Point every 2 sec while in Cat Form and Physical damage increased by 20%.

Restoration: Healing increased by 30%, and mana costs reduced by 50%.
Maul the target for 472,845 Physical damage.
Thrash, Swipe, Moonfire, and Maul have a 15% chance to reset the cooldown on Mangle, and to cause it to generate an additional 4 Rage.
Reduces all damage you take by 60% for 6 sec.

Sharp brambles protect you, absorbing and reflecting up to 9,789 damage from each attack.

While Barkskin is active, the brambles also deal 11,150 Nature damage to all nearby enemies every 1 sec.
Mangle deals 20% additional damage against bleeding targets.

Frenzied Regeneration's healing is increased by up to 120% based on your missing health.

Frenzied Regeneration has 1 additional charge.

Go berserk for 15 sec, reducing the cooldowns of Mangle, Thrash, and Growl by 50%.

Combines with other Berserk abilities.
Increases the duration of Barkskin and Ironfur by 2.0 sec.
Frenzied Regeneration heals over 2.0 additional sec and casts Rejuvenation and Regrowth on you at 200% effectiveness.
Gain magical damage reduction equal to 10% of your damage reduction from armor.
When you deal direct damage with Thrash, you gain a charge of Earthwarden, reducing the damage of the next auto attack you take by 25%. Earthwarden may have up to 3 charges.
Mangle generates 5 more Rage and deals 25% more damage.
Ironfur increases armor by an additional 15% and Barkskin reduces damage taken by an additional 10%.
When you cast Ironfur, also deal Physical damage equal to 20% of your armor, split among enemies within 12 yards. Damage reduced above 4 applications.

Go berserk for 15 sec, increasing haste by 15%, and reducing the rage cost of Maul by 50%.

Combines with other Berserk abilities.
While in Bear Form, you deal 20% increased Arcane damage.

Go berserk for 15 sec, reducing the cooldown of Frenzied Regeneration by 100% and cost of Ironfur by 50%.

Combines with other Berserk abilities.
Each stack of Thrash reduces the target's damage to you by 2% and increases your damage to them by 2%.
Your damage over time effects deal their damage in 25% less time, and your healing over time effects in 15% less time.
While in Bear Form, you deal 10% increased Arcane damage, and are healed for 25% of all Arcane damage done.

Your damage has a 5% chance to trigger a free automatic Moonfire on that target. 

When this occurs, the next Moonfire you cast generates 8 Rage, and deals 300% increased direct damage.
Thrash and Maul grant you an absorb shield for 25% of the damage dealt for 15 sec.

Thrash has a 20% chance to trigger an additional Thrash.

Thrash stacks 2 additional times.

An improved Bear Form that grants the benefits of Berserk, causes Mangle to hit up to 3 targets, and increases maximum health by 30%.

Lasts 30 sec. You may freely shapeshift in and out of this improved Bear Form for its duration.
Moonfire deals 8% increased damage and also hits another nearby enemy within 15 yds of the target.
Summons a beam of lunar light at your location, increasing your mastery by 30%, dealing 642,282 Arcane damage, and healing you for 4.6 million over 11 sec.

Lunar Beam
Lunar Beam now causes you to leech life equal to 10% of all damage dealt to enemies within the beam.

 Fury of Elune
Fury of Elune now ends with a flash of energy, blasting nearby enemies for 317,458 Astral damage.
Free automatic Moonfires from Galactic Guardian generate 5 Rage.
Moonfire deals 8% additional damage.
Bear Form and Moonkin Form reduce Arcane damage taken by 6% and all other magic damage taken by 3%.
Each non-Arcane damaging ability you use increases the damage of your next Arcane damaging ability by 3%, stacking up to 3 times.
Enemies damaged by Lunar Beam or Fury of Elune take 6% increased damage from you for 6 sec.
Enemies affected by Moonfire are slowed by 20%.
Thrash now deals Arcane damage and its damage is increased by 12%.

Moonfire damage has a chance to call down a Fury of Elune to follow your target for 3 sec.

 Fury of Elune
Calls down a beam of pure celestial energy, dealing 324,081 Astral damage over 3 sec within its area.

Generates 18 Rage over its duration.
Your Arcane abilities reduce the cooldown of Lunar Beam by 3.0 sec.

Further increases the power of Boundless Moonlight.

 Lunar Beam
Lunar Beam increases Mastery by an additional 11%, deals 30% increased damage, and lasts 3 sec longer.

 Fury of Elune
The flash of energy now generates  6 Rage and its damage is increased by 50%.

Rake the target for 60,350 Bleed damage and an additional 340,629 Bleed damage over 11.3 sec. 

While stealthed, Rake will also stun the target for 4 sec and deal 60% increased damage.

Awards 1 combo point.
Heals you for 20% health over 5 sec, and increases healing received by 20%.
Rake, Rip, and Thrash damage increased by 10%.
Thrash all nearby enemies, dealing immediate physical damage and periodic bleed damage. Damage varies by shapeshift form.

Stamina increased by 4%.

Stamina in Bear Form is increased by an additional 5%.
Frenzied Regeneration and Barkskin increase all healing received by 20%.
Nullifies corrupting effects on the friendly target, removing all Curse and Poison effects.
Physical damage and Armor increased by 6%.
Increases armor by 87,172 for 9 sec.
Barkskin's duration is increased by 4 sec.
Magical damage and healing increased by 6%.
Reduces all damage taken by 4%.

Survival Instincts and Barkskin reduce damage taken by an additional 10%.
Well-Honed Instincts can trigger up to once every 90 sec.

No Form: Haste
Cat Form: Critical Strike
Bear Form: Versatility
Moonkin Form: Mastery
Moonfire and Sunfire damage increased by 10%.
Infuse a friendly healer with energy, allowing them to cast spells without spending mana for 8 sec.
Shift into Bear Form and invoke the spirit of Ursol to let loose a deafening roar, incapacitating all enemies within 10 yards for 3 sec. Damage may cancel the effect.
Physical damage dealt by your abilities increased by 5%.
Form a bond with an ally. Your self-healing also heals your bonded ally for 10% of the amount healed. Your healing to your bonded ally also heals you for 8% of the amount healed.

Abilities not associated with your specialization are substantially empowered for 45 sec.

Balance: Cast time of Balance spells reduced by 30% and damage increased by 20%.

Feral: Gain 1 Combo Point every 2 sec while in Cat Form and Physical damage increased by 20%.

Restoration: Healing increased by 30%, and mana costs reduced by 50%.
Maul the target for 474,422 Physical damage.
Thrash, Swipe, Moonfire, and Maul have a 15% chance to reset the cooldown on Mangle, and to cause it to generate an additional 4 Rage.
Reduces all damage you take by 60% for 6 sec.

Sharp brambles protect you, absorbing and reflecting up to 9,789 damage from each attack.

While Barkskin is active, the brambles also deal 11,178 Nature damage to all nearby enemies every 1 sec.
Mangle deals 20% additional damage against bleeding targets.

Frenzied Regeneration's healing is increased by up to 120% based on your missing health.

Frenzied Regeneration has 1 additional charge.

Go berserk for 15 sec, reducing the cooldowns of Mangle, Thrash, and Growl by 50%.

Combines with other Berserk abilities.
Increases the duration of Barkskin and Ironfur by 2.0 sec.
Frenzied Regeneration heals over 2.0 additional sec and casts Rejuvenation and Regrowth on you at 200% effectiveness.

Mangle generates 5 more Rage and deals 25% more damage.
Ironfur increases armor by an additional 15% and Barkskin reduces damage taken by an additional 10%.

Combines with other Berserk abilities.
While in Bear Form, you deal 20% increased Arcane damage.

Go berserk for 15 sec, reducing the cooldown of Frenzied Regeneration by 100% and cost of Ironfur by 50%.

Combines with other Berserk abilities.
Each stack of Thrash reduces the target's damage to you by 2% and increases your damage to them by 2%.
Your damage over time effects deal their damage in 25% less time, and your healing over time effects in 15% less time.
While in Bear Form, you deal 10% increased Arcane damage, and are healed for 25% of all Arcane damage done.

Your damage has a 5% chance to trigger a free automatic Moonfire on that target. 

When this occurs, the next Moonfire you cast generates 8 Rage, and deals 300% increased direct damage.
Thrash and Maul grant you an absorb shield for 25% of the damage dealt for 15 sec.

Thrash has a 20% chance to trigger an additional Thrash.

Thrash stacks 2 additional times.

An improved Bear Form that grants the benefits of Berserk, causes Mangle to hit up to 3 targets, and increases maximum health by 30%.

Lasts 30 sec. You may freely shapeshift in and out of this improved Bear Form for its duration.
Moonfire deals 8% increased damage and also hits another nearby enemy within 15 yds of the target.
Summons a beam of lunar light at your location, increasing your mastery by 30%, dealing 645,776 Arcane damage, and healing you for 4.6 million over 11 sec.
Free automatic Moonfires from Galactic Guardian generate 5 Rage.
Moonfire deals 8% additional damage.
Bear Form and Moonkin Form reduce Arcane damage taken by 6% and all other magic damage taken by 3%.
Each non-Arcane damaging ability you use increases the damage of your next Arcane damaging ability by 3%, stacking up to 3 times.
Enemies damaged by Lunar Beam or Fury of Elune take 6% increased damage from you for 6 sec.
Enemies affected by Moonfire are slowed by 20%.
Thrash now deals Arcane damage and its damage is increased by 12%.

Moonfire damage has a chance to call down a Fury of Elune to follow your target for 3 sec.

 Fury of Elune
Calls down a beam of pure celestial energy, dealing 320,420 Astral damage over 3 sec within its area.

Generates 18 Rage over its duration.
Your Arcane abilities reduce the cooldown of Lunar Beam by 3.0 sec.

Further increases the power of Boundless Moonlight.

 Lunar Beam
Lunar Beam increases Mastery by an additional 11%, deals 30% increased damage, and lasts 3 sec longer.

 Fury of Elune
The flash of energy now generates  6 Rage and its damage is increased by 50%.
Heals the target for 274,404 over 10.2 sec.
Call down a burst of energy, causing 375,892 Arcane damage to the target, and 210,524 Arcane damage to all other enemies within 5 yards. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.

Stamina increased by 4%.

Stamina in Bear Form is increased by an additional 5%.
Heals up to 5 injured allies within 30 yards of the target for 213,905 over 5.9 sec. Healing starts high and declines over the duration.
Launch a surge of stellar energies at the target, dealing 328,397 Astral damage.
Nullifies corrupting effects on the friendly target, removing all Curse and Poison effects.
Nature's Cure additionally removes all Curse and Poison effects.

Shapeshift into Moonkin Form, increasing the damage of your spells by 10% and your armor by 125%, and granting protection from Polymorph effects.

The act of shapeshifting frees you from movement impairing effects.
Barkskin's duration is increased by 4 sec.
Magical damage and healing increased by 6%.
A quick beam of solar light burns the enemy for 36,924 Nature damage and then an additional 315,879 Nature damage over 13.5 sec.
Reduces all damage taken by 4%.
Increases the range of all of your spells by 5 yards.
Fly to a nearby ally's position.
Soothes the target, dispelling all enrage effects.

When a hit deals more than 12% of your maximum health, instantly heal for 10% of your health.

This effect cannot occur more than once every 30 seconds.

Wrath, Starsurge, and Starfire damage increased by 5%. 

Starsurge's cooldown is reduced by 4 sec and its mana cost is reduced by 50%.
Increases your movement speed by 15%.
When you fall below 40% health, you cast Frenzied Regeneration, up to once every 90 sec.
When you use Barkskin or Survival Instincts, absorb 475,723 damage for 8 sec.
Shift into Bear Form and let loose a wild roar, increasing the movement speed of all friendly players within 15 yards by 60% for 8 sec.

Rejuvenation's duration is increased by 3 sec.

Regrowth's duration is increased by 3 sec when cast on yourself.
Blasts targets within 15 yards in front of you with a violent Typhoon, knocking them back and reducing their movement speed by 50% for 6 sec. Usable in all shapeshift forms.
Survival Instincts and Barkskin reduce damage taken by an additional 10%.

You gain 12% of a stat while in each form:

No Form: Haste
Cat Form: Critical Strike
Bear Form: Versatility
Moonkin Form: Mastery
Moonfire and Sunfire damage increased by 10%.
Infuse a friendly healer with energy, allowing them to cast spells without spending mana for 8 sec.
Shift into Bear Form and invoke the spirit of Ursol to let loose a deafening roar, incapacitating all enemies within 10 yards for 3 sec. Damage may cancel the effect.
Magical damage dealt by your spells increased by 5%.
You retain Lycara's Teachings' bonus from your most recent shapeshift form for 5 sec after shifting out of it, provided you remained in that form for 2.9 sec, reduced by Haste.
Form a bond with an ally. Your self-healing also heals your bonded ally for 10% of the amount healed. Your healing to your bonded ally also heals you for 8% of the amount healed.

Shred, Rake, and Skull Bash can be used in any form and shift you into Cat Form, if necessary. 

Mangle can be used in any form and shifts you into Bear Form. 

Wrath and Starfire shift you into Moonkin Form, if known.

Abilities not associated with your specialization are substantially empowered for 45 sec.

Balance: Cast time of Balance spells reduced by 30% and damage increased by 20%.

Feral: Gain 1 Combo Point every 2 sec while in Cat Form and Physical damage increased by 20%.

Restoration: Healing increased by 30%, and mana costs reduced by 50%.

Heals the target for 411,655 over 12.8 sec. When Lifebloom expires or is dispelled, the target is instantly healed for 274,109.

May be active on one target at a time.
Heals you for 3% of your maximum health every 5 sec. If you are at full health, an injured party or raid member will be healed instead.
Clearcast Regrowths heal for an additional 30%.
Swiftmend heals the target for 236,597 over 7.7 sec.
For each Rejuvenation you have active, Regrowth's cost is reduced by 8% and critical effect chance is increased by 8%, up to a maximum of 96%.
Regrowth's initial heal has a 40% increased chance for a critical effect if the target is already affected by Regrowth.
Increases Omen of Clarity's chance to activate Clearcasting to 5% and Clearcasting can stack 1 additional time.

Abundance now also reduces the cast time of Regrowth by 5% per stack.

Cenarion Ward's cooldown is reduced by 10 sec and its duration is increased by 2 sec.
Grows a healing blossom at the target location, restoring 35,539 health to three injured allies within 10 yards every 1.8 sec for 30 sec. Limit 1.

Heals all allies within 40 yards for 2.1 million over 4.5 sec. Each heal heals the target for another 12,256 over 6.8 sec, stacking.

Healing decreased beyond 5 targets.
The target's skin becomes as tough as Ironwood, reducing damage taken by 20% for 12 sec.
Swiftmend increases the healing of your next Regrowth or Rejuvenation by 150%, or your next Wild Growth by 50%.

Summons a Treant which will immediately cast Swiftmend on your current target, healing for 246,731.  The Treant will cast Nourish on that target or a nearby ally periodically, healing for 58,245. Lasts 15 sec.
When Rejuvenation heals a target below 60% health, it applies Cultivation to the target, healing them for 32,447 over 5.1 sec.
Ironbark's cooldown is reduced by 20 sec.
When Lifebloom blooms, up to 3 targets within your Efflorescence are healed for 120,458.
Regrowth's healing over time is increased by 50%, and it also applies to the target of your Lifebloom.
Rejuvenation healing is increased by up to 15%, and Tranquility healing is increased by up to 15%, healing for more on low-health targets.
Lifebloom counts for 3 stacks of Mastery: Harmony.
Allies protected by your Ironbark also receive 75% of the healing from each of your active Rejuvenations and Ironbark's duration is increased by 4 sec.
Each target healed by Efflorescence is healed for an additional 25,095 over 5.1 sec.

Call upon the spirits for an eruption of energy, channeling a rapid flurry of 16 Druid spells and abilities over 4 sec.

You will cast Ferocious Bite, Shred, Moonfire, Wrath, Regrowth, Rejuvenation, Rake, and Thrash on appropriate nearby targets, favoring your current shapeshift form.

When you cast Starsurge, Rake, Shred, or Frenzied Regeneration you gain Heart of the Wild for 15 sec, once every 1 min.

 Heart of the Wild
Abilities not associated with your specialization are substantially empowered for 45 sec.

Balance: Cast time of Balance spells reduced by 30% and damage increased by 20%.

Feral: Gain 1 Combo Point every 2 sec while in Cat Form and Physical damage increased by 20%.

Restoration: Healing increased by 30%, and mana costs reduced by 50%.
Swiftmend no longer consumes a heal over time effect, and extends the duration of your heal over time effects on the target by 8 sec.
Your damage over time effects deal their damage 25% faster, and your healing over time effects heal 5% faster.

Incarnation: Tree of Life
During Incarnation: Tree of Life, you summon a Grove Guardian every 10 sec. The cooldown of Incarnation: Tree of Life is reduced by 5.0 sec when Grove Guardians fade.

 Convoke the Spirits
Convoke the Spirits' cooldown is reduced by 50% and its duration and number of spells cast is reduced by 25%. Convoke the Spirits has an increased chance to use an exceptional spell or ability.

Wrath and Shred transfer 100% of their damage and Starfire and Swipe transfer 50% of their damage into healing onto a nearby ally. 

This effect is increased by 200% while Heart of the Wild is active.

Consuming Clearcasting now causes your Regrowth to also cast Nourish onto a nearby injured ally at 60% effectiveness, preferring those with your heal over time effects.

 Nourish:
Heals a friendly target for 696,252.  Receives 300% bonus from Mastery: Harmony.

While your Lifebloom is on yourself, your periodic heals heal 10% faster.

While your Lifebloom is on an ally, your periodic heals on them have a 4% chance to cause it to bloom.
Wild Growth has a 60% chance to cause your next Rejuvenation or Regrowth to apply to 2 additional allies within 20 yards of the target.
Your Grove Guardians cast Moonfire on nearby targets about once every 6 sec.
Your maximum mana is increased by 5%.
Your Regrowth protects you, reducing damage you take by 8% while your Regrowth is on you.
Your Grove Guardians' Nourish and Swiftmend spells also apply a Minor Cenarion Ward that heals the target for 339,355 over 6.8 sec the next time they take damage.
Casting Swiftmend increases your Haste by 10% for 6 sec.

Wrath and Starfire damage increased by 10%. 

Regrowth, Wild Growth, and Swiftmend healing increased by 9%.
Your Grove Guardians' healing is increased by 30%.

Time elapsed while your major abilities are available to be used or at maximum charges is subtracted from that ability's cooldown after the next time you use it, up to 15 seconds.

Affects Force of Nature, Celestial Alignment, and Convoke the Spirits.

Every 5 Regrowths you cast makes your next Wrath, Starfire, or Entangling Roots instant and increases damage it deals by 100%.

Every 5 Starsurges you cast makes your next Regrowth or Entangling roots instant.
Each of your Grove Guardians increases your healing done by 5% while active.
